Protocol# FusableLayerParameters

iOS 15.0+iPadOS 15.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 12.0+tvOS 15.0+visionOSwatchOS 8.0+

```
protocol FusableLayerParameters
```

Deprecated

Use the BNNSGraph API instead.
